titles.title: Veterans BOND Act
To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to inform individuals who are eligible to enroll in the dental insurance plan administered by the Secretary of the benefits of such plan.
Veterans Benefits and Options Notification of Dental Insurance Act
Veterans BOND Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Veterans Benefits and Options Notification of Dental Insurance Act or the Veterans BOND Act
This bill directs the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) to mail to veterans, certain survivors, and dependents notice of the dental insurance plan administered by the VA.
